title: Fund of Machine Learning
description: An introduction to the fundamentals and applications of Machine Learning. Students cannot receive credit for both ECE 4252 and CS 4641.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (MATH 2550 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2551 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) and CS 1301 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
